content: Is there a way to view the proof term corresponding to some definition that uses tactics, similar to the Print command in Coq? I've tried looking for this but all I could find is the ? argument to some tactics like simp, while I'd want something that expands out an entire definition rather than a single tactic.
or show_term to show the expression generated by a subterm or tactic
#print is exactly what I was looking for; thanks!
